**Roof ROI Calculations** (60 min) - Price with/without tile removal - 5-year payback scenarios - Handle "just paint it white" objection - Create roof assessment checklist - Share successful quotes from field ### **Day 3: Wall Solutions - The 2-Year Payback** **Morning (Lecture + Demo)** - **Wall Insulation Systems** (60 min) - *Ghassan's case*: "$2,400 investment, recovered in 2 years" - Perlite "Labkh" mixing demonstration - *Aya's ICF system*: "100 houses, only 10% premium" - **The Hidden Energy Thief** (60 min) - Air infiltration costs more than you think - *Omar*: "Skylight in right direction = no flu" - Window sizing mistakes (*Aya*: "Big windows, closed curtains") - Natural ventilation without sacrificing privacy - Integration of all interventions **Mid-Day (Project Studio)** - **Sealing & Ventilation Lab** (90 min) - Find and seal cracks with caulk - Install window gaskets properly - Mount exhaust fan with proper sizing - Create cross-ventilation paths - Test airflow improvements **Evening (Dialogue & Role-Play)** - **Integrated Design Practice** (60 min) - Combine roof + walls + air sealing - Phased approach for limited budgets - Total comfort improvement calculations - Present complete home solution - Review intervention priority matrix ### **Day 5: Sales Engineering Masterclass** **Morning (Lecture + Demo)** - **Trust Through Measurement** (60 min) - *Omar's guarantee*: "10¬∞C drop or don't pay - we got 17¬∞C" - *Muthanna's three market tiers*: "Poor, middle-cautious, middle-bold" - Building credibility with data - Portfolio development with 100-house examples -
